snippet.title: Idle Inventor - Factory Tycoon Gameplay Walkthrough #1 (Android, IOS)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD GAME Idle Inventor - Factory Tycoon

Android, IOS: https://krugames.net/?p=10708

Walkthrough:

New Games: https://bit.ly/34Emkrt

Best Games: https://bit.ly/3jGC15E

Subscribe For Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGmmFPAaUA8hKRjV9GQNetQ?sub_confirmation=1

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/KruGames

Facebook: https://goo.gl/14ZWyM
Twitter: https://goo.gl/BVahdF
Website: https://krugames.net
Discord: krugames#2660

Thanks for watching. If you enjoyed my video please
Comment, Like, Favorite, Subscribe
and Share as this really helps me :)

Action: https://goo.gl/OcMMHQ
Strategy: https://goo.gl/oaDyZw
Role Playing: https://goo.gl/LMmvE9
Simulation: https://goo.gl/PeD64n
Puzzle: https://goo.gl/f3JMPt
Casual: https://goo.gl/bPHyI5
Arcade: https://goo.gl/gTzI6c
Racing: https://goo.gl/XvzXyx
Sports: https://goo.gl/4BhmtQ
Adventure: https://goo.gl/QqW8FR

#krugames

The video was shot and edited by KruGames. Please don't Reup.
All issues related to game copyright please contact: heartkruzza@gmail.com
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Churn out 🚋🚊massive machines🚙🚀 in your finely-tuned factory - day and night, 😃even while you’re not playing!😃

Run 5 distinct factories with their own themed vehicles:

- 12 cars 🚙
- 12 flying machines ✈
- 12 construction vehicles 🚚
- 12 military vehicles 🚁
- 12 spacecraft vehicles 🚀

And more!

As a factory-owning tycoon🎩, you’ll be deciding how to max out your production. Every container of yours that reaches the cargo ship = 💲more profits!💲

As profits roar in, reinvest—

💲 Open a new line
💲 Automate a line
💲 Hire & upgrade almost 200 different managers
💲 Even upgrade the entire factory!😲
💲 Complete 13 types of exciting missions

Manufacture cars🚓, trucks🚚, planes✈, military vehicles🚁, and high-tech instruments for space exploration!🚀

(Tip: When a special offer comes along, leap at it!😁 It’s your chance to earn profits, research points and more!)

Watch your factory grow from a single production line to a 💪world-famous industrial powerhouse💪. And because you’re automating, your factory keeps working while you’re away - check in the morning, 😄it’s amazing to see how much money you made while sleeping😄

Try it now, and see how the idle tycoon life🎩 suits you!👉
